headline: Is Lam Research’s Rally Justified After AI Chip Surge and Strong 2025 Momentum?
summary: If you are on the fence about Lam Research right now, you are not alone. The stock has seen an impressive trajectory this year, nearly doubling year-to-date with a 95.3% return that easily grabs anyone’s attention. The last month alone delivered a 16.1% jump, with just this past week showing a fresh 7.7% upswing. These moves have sparked plenty of conversations about what is fueling the momentum. Some point to new optimism around semiconductor demand thanks to the AI boom and broader supply...
